short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access Gain.pro’s company and investor data directly from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gain.pro extension revolutionizes the way you access private market intelligence while surfing the web. Seamlessly integrated into your browser, this extension allows Gain.pro users to unlock information and data on private companies and financial sponsors without ever leaving your current tab.

→ Gain full visibility on private market companies
With a simple click, you can instantly access a company’s Gain.pro profile while browsing its website, allowing you to view its holistic business information, complete financial data, ownership details, and much more. This empowers you to focus your attention on your research without having to switch between tabs.

→ Understand investors with ease
The extension allows you to deep dive into financial sponsor information directly from their webpage. Explore their portfolios without having to dig through their site, and gain a complete picture of their fundraising, estimated dry powder, exit strategies, and other essential investment activities.

→ Always access the full story
While surfing the web, we’ll notify you when we have information and data on the company or investor you’re viewing. This way, you can always gain a full view of their profile when it’s available.

→ Simplify your private market research
The Gain.pro extension is designed to make your company and investor research process more efficient by reducing the need for multiple open tabs, allowing you to maintain deep focus on your work.

→ Save your research for later
Bookmark a company or investor profile with a single click to save your research for later. When you log back into your Gain.pro account, you can seamlessly pick up where you left off.
